attributes.action: Scrap the idea to introduce ID cards
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Its totally unnecessary, we already have passports and photo driving liciences. An extra card is extra cost to public and not needed.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Scrap the idea to introduce ID cards"

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14285.asp

Prime Minister's Office
